'''Buzuleac''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the World Quest [[Shuumatsuban Operations]]. He may be killed if the Traveler chooses to reveal that they are related to the [[Shuumatsuban]]. His real identity is a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer]].
